meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>flavor</kanji> of this <kanji>direction</kanji> is one I'd like to follow and go in, along with you. You have a good flavor and you're going in a good direction. Will you be my <vocabulary>ally</vocabulary>? I'll be your <vocabulary>supporter</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This word uses the on'yomi reading for 味 and the kun'yomi reading for 方. Luckily, you've learned them both already so you should be able to read this word!
